title: 30th Annual Massanutten Hoo-Ha!
subtitle: The second epic race in the XXC-VA Marathon MTB Series!
description:
Saturday, June 2:
ENDURO begins at 9:00AM!
Sunday, June 3:
XXC (32 miles) begins at 9:00AM
Pro and Expert XC (22 miles) begins at 11:00AM.
Sport, Singlespeed, and Clydesdale (12 miles) begins at 11:00AM
Junior (9 miles) begins at 11:45AM
author: kyle
keywords: race, massanutten, harrisonburg, marathon mtb, xcm, cross country, charlottesville, richmond, xxcva, xxc, enduro, bike race, mountain bike race
